alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:46PM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.8 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Impact...At 7.5 feet, Flooding of houses and yards increase considerably. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1115 AM EST.
